title: Mark's levels
content: People, tell me, please, the status of levels which are made by Mark (Candyjunk).[img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]

title: Re: Mark's levels
content:
Ha, I was sure you'd post this question once again someday. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

I'm sorry to disappoint you, but no news is heard about those. I'm pretty sure the project has, too bad, ended. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] [url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Mark's levels
content: There's plenty of other exciting Keen stuff going on, why do you post about a 2 year old levelpack every six months?[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

content:

I'm even more sure that he will post post this question again someday.-----------------

Jamster! rules!

title: Re: Mark's levels
content:
Candyjunk hasn't posted here in years, has he?

[quote]Quote:[hr]Djaser: I'm even more sure that he will post post this question again someday.[hr][/quote]
Given his last four posts/ topics, I'm fairly certain of that, too :-)
[img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/misc/SupFanat.jpg[/img]

SupFanat, a)why don't you Mark about his levels? b) With complete Keen mods to play, why are you still waiting for a level pack? Is there something special about them that I've missed?--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Mark's levels
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Candyjunk hasn't posted here in years, has he?[hr][/quote]
The last post I remember reading of his was dated July 2003. Of course, I can't be sure of that after ezBoard's sudden bout of "amnesia".[url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url]
[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Mark's levels
content: The beta of the level pack was good, they're good levels and so on, but as said before, there's plenty of finished mods and stuff that are worth a play..[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Mark's levels
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]b) With complete Keen mods to play, why are you still waiting for a level pack? Is there something special about them that I've missed? [hr][/quote]
I want to have finished Mark's levels, because their beta version was very interesting. I played few times his finished levels: they are best. So i hope that Mark will ever finish all other ones.
Of course, i can finish them youself, but it's not so interesting, as waiting for new levels from Mark, because i'd like to see, what HE can.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-annoyed.gif[/img]:"> [img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]

title: Re: Mark's levels
content:
Ah. Now that I think about it, I'd enjoy playing a new levelpack (not that the mods aren't fun or anything). There hasn't been one in like, years.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Mark's levels
content:
*adds to list of things to do.

Why don't we just finnish the beta for him and say Mark did it? It'd keep him quiet.

title: Re: Mark's levels
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]The last post I remember reading of his was dated July 2003.[hr][/quote] No, Candyjunk has updated his levelset at September, 2004 (One new level for Keen 5). I have much older version of these levels. Djaser, please get this update (lastest version of levels) from Mark (if you don't have it already) and send it to Xtraverse. I want to play it.

I would like to ask again: are there recent good news related with this levelset, i hope? Mark's levels are BEST, but when he will finish them? [img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]

title: Re: Mark's levels
content:
His only reported deadline was late 2008.
